Uses of Package
themes

  • Packages that use themes 
    Package Description
    drawing  
    media.xuggle  
    playlist  
    themes  
    util  
  • Classes in themes used by drawing 
    Class and Description
    GFXElement
    GFXElement is the base class for all GFXElements in MV-Coda.
    Theme
    A theme collects a series of GFXElements that were intended to be displayed together i.e.: for a particular chart.
  • Classes in themes used by media.xuggle 
    Class and Description
    Theme
    A theme collects a series of GFXElements that were intended to be displayed together i.e.: for a particular chart.
  • Classes in themes used by playlist 
    Class and Description
    XMLSerialisable
    Used as a shared type for XML serialisable classes i.e.: so we can have generic reader and writer
  • Classes in themes used by themes 
    Class and Description
    AnimationData
    Animation data is used by GFXElements and describes what the animation properties are - these are: Reverse - if the element has no animate-out, we will reverese the in-animation to animate out Speed - the speed at which we will reverse out, if the above applies Loop - some animations have a looping hold point so we need to loop this while at the hold point Numbers - numbered animations are groups of animations that describe what chart position the music video is on, these are found differently from non-grouped elements
    CoOrd
    Means of simplifying specifying coordinates
    FrameData
    Frame data describes GFXElements' frame properties for elements that have an animate-in and/or animate-out section (which is most of them) - this means: * Where does the animate-in end? - one frame before firstHoldFrame * For how long does the "hold" section last in the seqeuence - from firstHoldFrame to lastHoldFrame * Where does the animate-out begin? one frame after lastHoldFrame
    GFXElement
    GFXElement is the base class for all GFXElements in MV-Coda.
    XMLSerialisable
    Used as a shared type for XML serialisable classes i.e.: so we can have generic reader and writer
  • Classes in themes used by util 
    Class and Description
    Theme
    A theme collects a series of GFXElements that were intended to be displayed together i.e.: for a particular chart.
